name: NaturaMeditation
0:
”Alexa, open Natura Meditation”
”Alexa, ask Natura Meditation for sleep well”
”Alexa, start Natura Meditation”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: natura meditation
des:
The Natura Meditation skill gathers simple and free meditation tasks for you to do anywhere and anytime. 

Guided meditation in short tracks from 4 to 10 minutes with different themes. Explore and discover a new lifestyle with the guided meditations. 

Exercises for mindfulness, relaxing, deep breathing, better sleeping, and anger relievement. 
Do you want to meditate for 5 minutes? 
Find the best exercise on the meditation app and enjoy!

Explore and discover a new lifestyle with the Natura guided meditations. S2

We believe that these well-being exercises are simple tools that can generate more balance to your daily routine. 
Little by little, everyday, the goal is to live a life of awareness and presence in your time and space. 

Do you have any improvement suggestions for us? Send an e-mail to appnatura@natura.net
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
